etymologies: late Middle English: variant of Old English sprot, of unknown origin

definitions: a small marine fish of the herring family, widely caught for food and fish products.

notes.text: Sprattus and other genera, family Clupeidae: several species, in particular S. sprattus of European inshore waters

shortDefinitions: small marine fish of herring family

definitions: any of a number of small fishes that resemble the true sprats, e.g. the sand eel.
shortDefinitions: several small fishes that resemble true sprats
